Package controller

package controller
  • Class Summary
    Class
    Description
    BossProgressController
    This is the controller which handles the boss life progress bar.
    GameController
    Game controller handles all game's operations:
    updating positions, checking for collisions, handling switching levels,
    draw the map according to different difficulty of the game, the text shown on the
    screen and removing objects.
    HighScoreController
    HighController class is for the control of the high score board(Game Over)
    The only difference between a highscore board and a win screen is high score board show when you lose
    Win screen is when you win but also shows the history five highest records.
    InfoScoreController
    InfoController class is for the control of the Info page
    PauseController
    PauseController class is for pause screen during the game
    PlayerInputController
    This is the controller which handles the player input screen.
    Two actions of two buttons are handled.
    SettingController
    SettingController class is for the setting event control
    startScreenController
    startScreenController class is for the control of the start screen
    WinController
    WinController class is for the control of the player win screen
